Okinawa water sports center provide English, Mandarin and Cantonese speaking marine staff

From 2014 Berry have started this Paintball activity in Kanucha Bay Hotel &Villas Nago with a soft opening. This paintball do come with many customise game that do suit for Family, Group of friends and Company Outdoor program. Is a very highly recommended team work field game that we put people together in a team. Beside for group field game, Berry do have some customize game for family purpose.

• Wearing long sleeve shirt and pants during the game (Jeans and tick material top require)
  • Extra set of wear to change after Paintball game (shower and towel provided)
  • Sport shoe or any outdoor purpose sneaker (must full cover your foot)
  • A small towel use during the game.
Guest will not allow to participate painball activity on the spot is suspected under Recreation Drug or Alcohol influence (full charges will still apply)

Click on BOOKING NOW, you will require to fill in your email address as your contact. Fill in all information as required and summit. You will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY4,000 per person within 3 days start from the day you receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if your booking request is less than less than 3 days from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit receive.
